sentence.Network_en: Fiacre and Scotus on their creepystools in heaven spilt from their pintpots, loudlatinlaughing: Euge!
sentence.Network_cn: 菲亚克 和斯科特斯坐在天堂那针毡般的三脚凳上,酒从能装一品脱的大缸子里洒了出来, 朗朗发出夹着拉下文的笑声.
